titleStmt.title: The pious prentice, or, The prentices piety Wherein is declared, how they that intend to be prentices, may 1. Rightly enter into that calling. 2. Faithfully abide in it. 3. Discreetly accomplish it. 4. And how they may be satisfied in conscience in such doubts as may arise upon some particular occasions and occurrences proper to that calling: by A.J.
Pious prentice.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Abraham, 1589-1646?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for M. Sparke and Ioh. Hardisty, and are to be sold at the signe of the blue Bible in Green-Arbor,

notesStmt.note: With a final imprimatur leaf: Imprimatur. Guil. Bray. Novemb. 22.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the blue Bible in Green-Arbor
